engine package

Submodules

engine.embed module

class engine.embed.RepoEmbedClient(base_url)[source]

Bases: object

annotate_documents(folder_path, azure_deployment_embed, azure_deployment_llm, output_path)[source]

Annotates documents within the specified folder using embeddings and language model operations.

Args:

folder_path (str): The path to the folder containing the documents to be annotated. azure_deployment_embed (str): The name of the Azure deployment for embeddings. azure_deployment_llm (str): The name of the Azure deployment for language model operations. output_path (str): The path where annotated documents should be saved.

annotate_patient(folder_path, azure_deployment_embed, azure_deployment_llm, lab_repo, output_path)[source]

Annotates patient records within the specified folder using embeddings and language model operations, incorporating lab repository data.

Args:

folder_path (str): The path to the folder containing the patient records to be annotated. azure_deployment_embed (str): The name of the Azure deployment for embeddings. azure_deployment_llm (str): The name of the Azure deployment for language model operations. lab_repo (str): The lab repository to use for additional context in annotations. output_path (str): The path where annotated patient records should be saved.

classmethod interactive_session(base_url)[source]

Starts an interactive session for annotating documents or patient records.

Args:

base_url (str): The base URL of the application providing the annotation functionality.

engine.search module

class engine.search.RepoSearchClient(base_url)[source]

Bases: object

classmethod interactive_session(base_url, folder_path, azure_deployment_embed, azure_deployment_llm)[source]

Starts an interactive session that allows the user to ask questions in a loop.

Parameters:

  • base_url – The base URL of the application providing the search functionality.

  • folder_path – Path to the folder containing text files to be analyzed.

  • azure_deployment_embed – Azure deployment name for embeddings.

  • azure_deployment_llm – Azure deployment name for language model operations.

search(folder_path, azure_deployment_embed, azure_deployment_llm, user_inquiry)[source]

Performs a search operation by sending a POST request to the /repo_search endpoint.

Parameters:

  • folder_path – Path to the folder containing text files to be analyzed.

  • azure_deployment_embed – Azure deployment name for embeddings.

  • azure_deployment_llm – Azure deployment name for language model operations.

  • user_inquiry – The user’s inquiry/question.

Returns:

The search result.
